subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN1781, how did it go?
description_text: This hasn’t arrived and I have gotten tracking. Sent from my iPhone On Jul 3, 2025, at 10:20 AM, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote: ﻿ Hello Brad, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ Hello Brad, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback VAM Pro Set (2 pac/includes power supply) Dislike it Love it! Unsubscribe

conversations.body_text: Hi Brad Yake,     Sorry for the delay, your despatch was delayed by a few days as we sold out and ran out of stock of our first batch of Haptic Reactor, your order has been dispatched and is expected to arrive around the 9th.  https://www.track718.us/en/detail?nums=SF6045775417927
Hello, I still have not revised these items, please advise Brad Sent from my iPhone
Hi Brad Yake,     According to the tracking information, your package has been marked as delivered. You can also use the latest version of SIMHUB 9.9.3, which supports telemetry for our pedals.
